headline: JMU expert can discuss proposed Norfolk Southern merger with Union Pacific
summary: Harrisonburg, Virginia, Oct. 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As Norfolk Southern continues talks to merge with Union Pacific, one of the nation’s largest West Coast railroads, the potential deal is drawing attention for how it could reshape the U.S. freight system. If approved, the merger would create the first true transcontinental rail carrier and significantly reduce competition in the industry. Mert Tokman, professor of marketing, business, and global supply chain management at James Madison Un
